name: Eldarya Dark Mode
description:
Dark theme for Eldarya. This theme does NOT fix web page bugs.

Author: Kuru from eldarya.es
additional_info:
- Scrollbar style fixed.
- More compact appearance.
- A bit compact market. 

Dark theme WIP, so you can find pages with the light theme.

-- 07/29/22 --
- Fixed details in Forum page.
- Theme added in Pet, Messaging and Mall pages.

-- 08/09/22 --
- Fixed details in Appearance page.
- Theme added in Account page.

-- 08/19/22 --
- Fixed details.

-- 08/29/22 --
- Fixed details in Forum.

-- 09/09/22 --
- Theme added in intern pages.

-- 09/30/22 --
- Theme added in polls.

-- 12/19/22 --
- Decreased brightness on event page (Christmas 2022).

-- 01/11/22 --
- Fix theme in exploration.
- Fixed details in forum.
